/ Academics / Graduate Studies

Academic Programs

The College of Engineering offers more than 65 degree programs at the BS, MS, and PhD level, as well as a wide range of minors and graduate certificates. In addition to our Boston campus, some graduate programs are offered at regional campuses. Flexible graduate program formats include on-campus, online and hybrid courses, and full- and part-time options to meet individual needs.
